what: Download shapefiles of Freshwater Ecoregions of the World (FEOW)
title: Download shapefiles of Freshwater Ecoregions of the World (FEOW)
text: feowR provides faster secure way download shapefiles Freshwater Ecoregions World (FEOW) using piggyback R package.

title: Download shapefiles of Freshwater Ecoregions of the World (FEOW)
text: can install development version feowR GitHub :

title: Download shapefiles of Freshwater Ecoregions of the World (FEOW)
text: Now let’s plot !  can see list ecoregions, FEOW website Look Freshwater Ecoregions Neotropical region!
code: library(feowR)  feow_sf <- read_feow() library(ggplot2)  ggplot(data = feow_sf)+   geom_sf() ecoregions_list #> # A tibble: 426 × 4 #>       id realm    major_habitat_type                       ecoregion             #>    <int> <chr>    <chr>                                    <chr>                 #>  1   101 Nearctic Polar freshwaters                        Alaskan Coastal       #>  2   102 Nearctic Polar freshwaters                        Upper Yukon           #>  3   103 Nearctic Temperate coastal rivers                 Alaska & Canada Paci… #>  4   104 Nearctic Temperate floodplain rivers and wetlands Upper Mackenzie       #>  5   105 Nearctic Polar freshwaters                        Lower Mackenzie       #>  6   106 Nearctic Polar freshwaters                        Central Arctic Coast… #>  7   107 Nearctic Temperate upland rivers                  Upper Saskatchewan    #>  8   108 Nearctic Temperate upland rivers                  Middle Saskatchewan   #>  9   109 Nearctic Large lakes                              English - Winnipeg L… #> 10   110 Nearctic Temperate coastal rivers                 Southern Hudson Bay   #> # ℹ 416 more rows library(dplyr)  feow_sf |>   left_join(ecoregions_list, by = join_by("FEOW_ID" == "id")) |>   filter(realm == "Neotropic") |>   ggplot()+   geom_sf()

title: Ecoregions List — ecoregions_list
text: dataset provides information FEOW ecoregions, including major habitat types specific ecoregions.

title: Ecoregions List — ecoregions_list
text: data frame 426 rows 4 variables: id integer vector. unique identifier ecoregion. realm character vector. biogeographic realm. major_habitat_type character vector. major habitat type ecoregion. ecoregion character vector. specific name ecoregion.

title: Ecoregions List — ecoregions_list
text: Nature Conservancy World Wildlife Fund, Inc.

title: Read FEOW HydroSheds data — read_feow
text: function downloads reads FEOW ecoregions data brunomioto/feowR repository.

title: Read FEOW HydroSheds data — read_feow
text: overwrite Logical (default FALSE). TRUE, existing file overwritten.

title: Read FEOW HydroSheds data — read_feow
text: spatial data frame containing FEOW ecoregions polygons.

title: Read FEOW HydroSheds data — read_feow
text: Nature Conservancy World Wildlife Fund, Inc.
